sys_script_include.name: addChoiceToList

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_96d1fd19476b3d10d1df690cd36d4390
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.addChoiceToList</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>addChoiceToList</name><script><![CDATA[function addChoiceToList(tableName, fieldName, value, label) {// The entries created will go in the Choice table
    var choiceTable = new global.GlideRecord('sys_choice');// Initialize a new blank record for our choice.
    choiceTable.initialize();// Set the values passed into the function for this choice

    choiceTable.setValue('name',tableName);
    choiceTable.setValue('element',fieldName);
    choiceTable.setValue('value',value);
    choiceTable.setValue('label',label);// Commit the record to the table
    choiceTable.update();}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-04 13:27:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>96d1fd19476b3d10d1df690cd36d4390</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>addChoiceToList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_96d1fd19476b3d10d1df690cd36d4390</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-04 13:27:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
